{{html:
                            <a class="btn btn-small"  ng-click="payWithBitcoin()" style="margin-top: 4px;border-radius: 4px; padding-top: 6px;padding-left: 7px;padding-right: 10px;">
                                <img src="/$$space/.files/img/payment/Bitcoin-logo-with-text.png" alt="Bitcoin"
                                style="
                                        height: 22px;
                                        width: 85px;
                                        padding: 3px;"/>
                            </a><br/>

<script type="text/ng-template" id="bitcoinModal.html">
        <div class="modal-header">
            <h3><img src="/$$space/.files/img/payment/Bitcoin-logo-with-text.png"/> payment</h3>
        </div>
        <div id="bitcoinSpinner" ng-hide="spinnerShow" class="txt-center">
            <span class="fa fa-spinner fa-spin"/>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
            <div ng-show="bitcoin">
                <div ng-model="creditToAdd" class="row-fluid">
                    <div class="span3">Credit:</div><div>{[creditToAdd  | currency:"$"]}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid" ng-model="paymentinfo">
                    <div class="span3">Conversionrate:</div><div>{[paymentinfo.value | currency:"$"]}/BTC</div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid" ng-model="totalBtc">
                    <div class="span3"><h5>Total:</h5></div><div><h5>{[totalBtc]} BTC</h5></div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid">
                    <div class="span6" ng-model="paymenturl">
                        <a ng-href="{[paymenturl]}">
                        <p ng-model="paymentinfo">{[paymentinfo.address]}</p>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">

            <button class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="ok()">OK</button>
        </div>
    </script>

                            <a class="btn btn-small" ng-click="payWithLitecoin()" style="margin-top: 4px;border-radius: 4px; padding-top: 4px;padding-left: 6px;padding-right: 6px;">
                                <img src="/$$space/.files/img/payment/Litecoin-logo-with-text.png" alt="Litecoin" style="
                                        height: 24px;
                                        width: 90px;
                                        padding-top: 2px;
                                        padding-bottom: 0px;
                                        padding-left: 1px;
                                        padding-right: 5px;"/>
                            </a>

<script type="text/ng-template" id="litecoinModal.html">
        <div class="modal-header">
            <h3><img src="/$$space/.files/img/payment/Litecoin-logo-with-text.png"/> payment</h3>
        </div>
        <div id="litecoinSpinner" ng-hide="spinnerShow" class="txt-center">
            <span class="fa fa-spinner fa-spin"/>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
            <div ng-show="litecoin">
                <div ng-model="creditToAdd" class="row-fluid">
                    <div class="span3">Credit:</div><div>{[creditToAdd  | currency:"$"]}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid" ng-model="paymentinfo">
                    <div class="span3">Conversionrate:</div><div>{[paymentinfo.value | currency:"$"]}/LTC</div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid" ng-model="totalLtc">
                    <div class="span3"><h5>Total:</h5></div><div><h5>{[totalLtc]} LTC</h5></div>
                </div>
                <div class="row-fluid">
                    <div class="span6" ng-model="paymenturl">
                        <a ng-href="{[paymenturl]}">
                        <p ng-model="paymentinfo">{[paymentinfo.address]}</p>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">

            <button class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="ok()">OK</button>
        </div>
    </script>

<script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/CryptoPayments.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
